name: ザナック×ザナック
summary: Zanac x Zanac consists of two games: a port of the original Zanac, and a brand new game called Zanac Neo. The new game not only commemorates the 15th anniversary of the original Zanac but it also returns to the series’ roots. The story is sparse, and there are three pilots – Hokuto Yuuki, Noa Clonebit and Myctness Ikstess – although they barely show up in the game, only as shadows during loading screens and at the end credits.
